scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "sleep 1 && npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.sync-branch: CURRENT_BRANCH=$(git branch --show-current) && git checkout main && git pull && git checkout $CURRENT_BRANCH && git merge main && git push
scripts.delete-branch: CURRENT_BRANCH=$(git branch --show-current) && git checkout main && git pull && git push origin --delete $CURRENT_BRANCH && git branch -d $CURRENT_BRANCH && git branch
